mapper.select: SELECT owner, file_name `fileName`, file_type `fileType`, file_path `filePath`, dest_name `destName` FROM resume WHERE id=#{id}

SELECT r.id 'resumeId', r.owner, r.graduate_time 'graduateTime', r.file_path 'filePath', r.file_name 'fileName', r.education, r.major, r.dpt_id 'dptId', d.dpt_name 'dptName' FROM resume r, department d WHERE r.id = #{id} AND r.dpt_id = d.id
